title: Is There Any Social Principle for LLM-Based Agents?. (arXiv:2308.11136v1 [cs.CY])
abstract: Focus on Large Language Model based agents should involve more than "human-centered" alignment or application. We argue that more attention should be paid to the agent itself and discuss the potential of social sciences for agents.

Title: Is There Any Social Principle for LLM-Based Agents?. (arXiv:2308.11136v1 [cs.CY])
Abstract: Focus on Large Language Model based agents should involve more than "human-centered" alignment or application. We argue that more attention should be paid to the agent itself and discuss the potential of social sciences for agents.
translated_title: LLM基于智能体是否存在社会原则？
translated_abstract: 关注基于大型语言模型的智能体应该超越“以人为中心”的对齐或应用。我们认为应该更多关注智能体本身，并探讨社会科学在智能体中的潜力。
tldr: LLM基于智能体不仅应关注“以人为中心”的对齐或应用，还应关注智能体自身，并探讨社会科学在智能体中的潜力。
en_tdlr: Attention should not only be focused on "human-centered" alignment or application of LLM-based agents, but also on the agents themselves, and explore the potential of social sciences for agents.
